description: This is a Python test script using pytest to verify the functionality of Flutter project templates within a project initialization framework. It contains fixtures to set up mock Flutter project structures, tests for project initialization, configuration property replacements, template info retrieval, and handling of various project configurations and edge cases.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock Flutter template directory structure including configuration files, source files, and platform-specific directories.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a sample ProjectConfig instance representing a Flutter project configuration.

methods.name: test_flutter_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process, verifying the creation of project files and directories, and content correctness.

methods.name: test_flutter_template_validates_parameters()
methods.description: Validates parameter input for the Flutter template.

methods.name: test_flutter_template_basic_replacements(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that template files correctly replace project variables with provided project info.

methods.name: test_flutter_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that the template's initialization info (commands, environment info) is correctly retrieved.

methods.name: test_flutter_with_missing_template_config(temp_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures handling of missing template configuration files during initialization.

methods.name: test_template_project_variations(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests project initialization with different project configurations, including minimal and detailed info.

methods.name: test_special_character_handling(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Verifies correct handling and substitution of special characters in project info in config files.
